title: Col du Fréjus
text:
Col du Fréjus (el. 2,542 metres) is a mountain <a href="col">col</a> road in the <a href="Cottian%20Alps">Cottian Alps</a> on the border between <a href="France">France</a> and <a href="Italy">Italy</a>. It connects <a href="Bardonecchia">Bardonecchia</a>, Italy to <a href="Modane">Modane</a>, France.
The road over the mountain pass is not paved and limited to walking traffic. <a href="Vehicular">Vehicular</a> traffic utilizes the <a href="Fr%C3%A9jus%20Road%20Tunnel">Fréjus Road Tunnel</a>.
